sourcesContent: import { ChangeDetectorRef, Component, Directive, ElementRef, Input, ViewChild } from '@angular/core'; import { typeLayout } from '../constants/layout-variable'; @Component({ selector: 'app-book', templateUrl: './book.component.html', styleUrls: ['./book.component.scss'] }) export class BookComponent{ public tipo:number = typeLayout.tipo; constructor(){ } getPrev(){ if (this.tipo==0){ this.tipo = 3; } else { this.tipo = this.tipo -1; } console.log(this.tipo); } getNext(){ if (this.tipo>=3){ this.tipo = 0; } else { this.tipo = this.tipo +1; } console.log(this.tipo); } }
